docs.snippet: Jerry Tarkanian’s legacy is often seen in terms of his battles with the N.C.A.A., but his coaching methods hardly seem out of place today....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jerry Tarkanian’s legacy is often seen in terms of his battles with the N.C.A.A., but his coaching methods hardly seem out of place today.
docs.abstract: Profile of Jerry Tarkanian, whose legacy is often seen in terms of his battles with the NCAA; his methods, once thought unusual, were made famous at UNLV and he won more than 700 games, earned a national championship and went to four Final Fours, before retiring in 2002.

headline.seo: College Basketball Catches Up to Jerry Tarkanian
